document_data.caption: A map showing the Dune in the Corsair Domains.
document_data.name: the Dune
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dune''', also called '''Solitude''' or the '''Island of Exile''', was a small desert island found in the [[Corsair Domains]] of [[northwest Zakhara]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}} The island was part of an archipelago called the [[Desert's Virtues]].
document_data.Geography: The Dune was the smallest of the three islands of the Desert's Virtues archipelago, measuring roughly {{SI|30|mi|k|long=yes}} in diameter. Several smaller islands were located off of the Dune's northeast coast, but these were mostly large sand bars that could disappear with particularly high tides.
document_data.History: Anyone in the Corsair Domains who ran afoul of one of the [[Corsair (kit)|corsair]] captains risked being marooned on this desolate island.
